items.text: tossed up outside off, he drives and gets a thick inside edge to the leg side
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: quick and full outside off, he pokes his bat out and just misses the outside edge. Half an appeal from the keeper
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: goes back this time to cut the shorter ball, it turns away and beats him again
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: here's the wrong'un, here's another wicket for Rashid! Mahmudullah might have picked the googly there because he kept the bat in front of the stumps even though the ball pitched outside off. But it didn't turn as much as he expected and the ball came in just a bit to rattle the off stump. Rashid and Shahzad bring out the dab
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, OUT

items.preText: Mehidy Hasan walks out, welcomed by a slip an leg slip
items.text: he gets off the mark by punching the flat ball down the ground to long on
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: pitched up this time, he jams his bat down to send it back to Rashid's left
items.postText: Over to Akshay again. Can he get four wickets?
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.preText: Thanks, Vishal. If you're a Bangladesh fan, I have a penchant for taking games to the last ball.
items.text: strides forward and opens the face to backward point
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: backs away to a length ball and taps it to the vacant short third man region
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: plays too straight as the ball spins in, past the outside edge and off-stump
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: turns it away with the spin to midwicket
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: punched off the backfoot towards extra cover
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: another backfoot punch to extra cover. No run there
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: wrong'un, pretty full, comes forward to smother the turn
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: full and straight, front-foot defence
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: crunches a full-blooded drive past the cover fielder diving to his left
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, FOUR runs

items.text: non-turning straighter one, nearly shaves off stump after beating him
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: length on middle and leg, blocked
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: comes on straight and beats his half-prod to go past off-stump
items.postText: Rashid is now Afghanistan's leading wicket-taker in ODIs.
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: length, spins in, punched off the backfoot
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: comes forward and the ball slides in before going to midwicket off the inside of the bat
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: comes forward and nudges to square leg
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, spinning in, defended back
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: tries to slap but merely chips it in the air, on the bounce to long-off
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: fullish length, spins in, blocked
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: floats it up outside off and makes him reach out, Mehidy slices it straight into the hands of point
items.postText: Drinks on the field. End is near.
items.shortText: Rahmat Shah to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, OUT

dismissal.text: Mehidy Hasan Miraz c Hashmatullah Shahidi b Rahmat Shah 4 (10b 0x4 0x6) SR: 40.00
